title: 50 years since a woman scored (half) an F1 point, why aren't we closer to another?
summary: In 1975, Lella Lombardi was the last — and only — woman F1 driver to finish in the points. 50 years on and we're nowhere near seeing another, saysKaty Fairman. In fact, progress seems to have reversed

qa_pairs.question: Who was the first woman to score points in Formula 1?
In what year did Lella Lombardi achieve her historic points finish?
What is the significance of Lella Lombardi's achievement in F1 history?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: She is the only woman to finish in the points.
wrong_options: She was the first woman to race in F1.
She scored the most points in a single season.
